means: Those Hags Encourage Neuterism 那些女巫助长了无性的动物

sentence.Network_en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentence.Network_en: It was just then that I chanced to look round.
sentence.Network_cn: 就在那时，我恰好环顾了下四周。

sentence.Network_en: He then held the man in an armlock until police arrived.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他反扭住那名男子的手臂让他动弹不得，直到警察赶到。

jx.jx_en_mean: after all; on the other hand (introducing a contrasting comment)

lj.lj_ly: it couldn't help, but then again, it probably couldn't hurt.
lj.lj_ls: 它没什么用，不过可能也没危害。

lj.lj_ly: This project will take all our skill and then some.
lj.lj_ls: 这个工程将采用我们所有的技术，而且远不止此

means.word_mean: 于是,此外,而且,另一方面

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thænne, thanne, thonne, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch dan and German dann, also to that and the

encyclopedia.content: 英文单词then 词典解释副词 ad. 锛埼薇冉系燃讹級 1. （指过去）那时，当时；（指将来）到那时，届时。 He worked in that factory then. 他那时在那个工厂工作。 2. 然后，接着，其次。 They chatted for a while and then went to work. 他们聊了一会儿，然后上班去了。 3. [常用于句首或句尾]那么，既然这样 When will the manager be available, then? 那么经理什么时候可以接见我呢？ 4. 于是，所以 He, then, decided to ac

entry.def: Then means at a particular time in the past or in the future.

example.ex: He wanted to have a source of income after his retirement; until then, he wouldn't require additional money...
example.tran: 他想退休后有份收入;在那以前，他并不需要额外的钱。

example.ex: The clinic opened for business last October and since then has treated more than 200 people.
example.tran: 该诊所去年 10 月开业，从那以后已经接诊 200 多人。

entry.def: Then is used when you refer to something which was true at a particular time in the past but is not true now.

example.ex: ...the Race Relations Act of 1976 (enacted by the then Labour Government)...
example.tran: 1976 年的《种族关系法》(由当时的工党政府颁布施行)

example.ex: He was known by many for his role in the then record-breaking robbery of the mail train from Glasgow to London in August 1963.
example.tran: 他曾因参与 1963 年 8 月那起发生在从格拉斯哥开往伦敦的邮政列车上的特大抢劫案而恶名昭著。

entry.def: You use then to say that one thing happens after another, or is after another on a list.

example.ex: Add the oil and then the scallops to the pan, leaving a little space for the garlic...
example.tran: 先在锅里放油，然后放入扇贝，留点地方搁蒜。

example.ex: I felt myself blush. Then I sniffed back a tear...
example.tran: 我觉得自己的脸红了，接着我吸吸鼻子,不让眼泪掉下来。

entry.def: You use then in conversation to indicate that what you are about to say follows logically in some way from what has just been said or implied.

example.ex: 'I wasn't a very good scholar at school.' — 'What did you like doing best then?'...
example.tran: “我在学校时成绩不大好。”——“那么你当时最喜欢做什么呢？”

example.ex: You're not gonna tell me, are you? Do I have to guess, then?...
example.tran: 你不打算告诉我，是吧？那么，我只好猜猜了？

entry.def: You use then at the end of a topic or at the end of a conversation.

example.ex: 'I can meet you after work. Six o'clock?'— 'Fine.' — 'Six o'clock, then?'...
example.tran: “我下班后可以和你碰面。6 点可以吗？”——“行啊。”——“那就定 6 点啦？”
他站起身说，“就这么定了。”

entry.tran: (和 now，well，okay 等连用，引出新话题或新观点)
entry.def: You use then with words like 'now', 'well', and 'okay', to introduce a new topic or a new point of view.

example.ex: Now then, you say you walk on the fields out the back?
example.tran: 那么，你说你在后面的田地里散步？

example.ex: Well then, I'll put the kettle on and make us some tea...
example.tran: 好吧，我来烧壶水，我们沏点茶喝。

entry.tran: 也就是说，总之(引出总结或结论)
entry.def: You use then to introduce a summary of what you have said or the conclusions that you are drawing from it.

example.ex: This, then, was the music that appeared to dominate the world of serious concert music in the mid-1960s...
example.tran: 这就是 20 世纪 60 年代中期严肃的管弦乐中的主流音乐。

example.ex: By 1931, then, France alone in Europe was a country of massive immigration.
example.tran: 也就是说，到 1931 年的时候，法国是欧洲唯一一个拥有大量移民的国家。

entry.tran: 那么，则(引导if开头的句子的第二部分，第一部分描述可能的情况，第二部分引入结果)
entry.def: You use then to introduce the second part of a sentence which begins with 'if'. The first part of the sentence describes a possible situation, and then introduces the result of the situation.

example.ex: If the answer is 'yes', then we must decide on an appropriate course of action...
example.tran: 如果答案是肯定的，那么我们必须商定合适的行动方案。

entry.tran: 毕竟，话说回来，而且(用于句首，或用于 and，but 之后引出对之前所说话的评论或补充)
entry.def: You use then at the beginning of a sentence or after 'and' or 'but' to introduce a comment or an extra piece of information to what you have already said.

example.ex: We have to do quite a bit of reading, and then we have our ongoing work which would be an essay...
example.tran: 我们要进行大量阅读，而且手头有一篇论文要写。

example.ex: He sounded sincere, but then, he always did.
example.tran: 他听起来很真诚，可是话说回来，他向来如此。

means.word_mean: 1. subsequently or soon afterward (often used as sentence connectors);

sentences.sentence: "we watched the late movie and then went to bed"

means.word_mean: 2. in that case or as a consequence;

sentences.sentence: "if he didn't take it, then who did?"
"keep it then if you want to"

auth_sentence.res_content: How many gold medals would we have won then?

auth_sentence.res_content: Then follows a new challenge - the palate test.

sentences.en: I was travelling in Europe then.

means.word_mean: 接着, 于是, 然后，其后，后来

sentences.en: We had dinner together, and then went to the concert.
sentences.cn: 我们一起进晚餐, 然后去参加音乐会。

sentences.en: Then came the day of his examination.
sentences.cn: 接着到了他考试的日子。

means.word_mean: 还有, 而且，另外，再者
那么; 因此；既然如此

sentences.en: You say you don't want to call a doctor.Then what do you want to do?
sentences.cn: 你说你不想请医生, 那么你想怎么办?

jushi.english: Then opens an epoch of social reform.
jushi.chinese: 接着开始了一个社会改革的时代。

jushi.english: I hope we'll have finished by then.
jushi.chinese: 我希望到那时我们已经完成。

jushi.english: He was thoughtful for a while and then replied “no”.
jushi.chinese: 他思索了一会儿,然后回答说:“不”。
